data.system_settings: Samsung Galaxy S7 edge (SM-G935F), Android Nougat 7.0
data.actual_result: The server icon and region reset when changing display orientation
data.expected_result: The server icon and region shouldn't reset when changing display orientation
data.short_description: Changing display orientation when creating a new server resets server icon and region
data.steps_to_repro: - Scroll all the way down to the bottom in the channel list, press the plus icon and choose to create a new server - Tap the server's icon, upload an image and change the server region - Switch to landscape mode (or to portrait mode if you are in landscape) - Notice that the server icon and server region were reset
